title: Ed Davey – 2022 Comments on the State of the Government
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ed Davey, the Leader of the Liberal Democrats, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content:
This is the most chaotic and incompetent government I’ve seen in my lifetime.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

How much longer will they cling on to power while the country suffers?
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

General Election now.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
